transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Basant sir namaskar Amrit baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji video meet ka request tha sir send karu aapko link?
Customer: Ji bhejiye.
Executive: Sir system se join honge ya phone se aap?
Customer: System.
Executive: Theek hai mai Amrit Pandey ke naam se join
Customer: raha hu sir.
Customer: Dekhiye sir kya hoga.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aaya sir Amrit ke naam se.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir yaha se yaha scroll cut kar de phone se?
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Nahi sir aap baat kaise karenge usme to aawaz nahi aayegi na itni.
Customer: Aawaz nahi aati.
Executive: Theek hai sir mai apna screen share kar raha hu ek minute.
Customer: Theek hai kariye.
Executive: Meri screen visible hai dikh rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Portal open karna hai sir aapke screen pe.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Portal open kar raha hu sir ek minute.
Executive: Sir ye aap IndiaMART open karte hai to ye portal aapko dikhega.
Customer: Ji haan ji dikhta hai.
Executive: Theek hai aur aap aapne bataya tha mam ko ki aapko Saharanpur se lead nahi chahiye waise pure UP se chahiye sir?
Customer: Haan UP se ho lekin Saharanpur se kya karunga main mujhe Saharanpur ki lead chahiye hi nahi.
Executive: Reason jaan sakta hu sir kyunki business to sahi se bhi ho sir aapke to business.
Customer: Nahi nahi Saharanpur mein nahi aana hai sir Saharanpur mein leta hi nahi koi yaha.
Executive: Achha Saharanpur nahi.
Customer: Ek minute.
Customer: Achha ye bataye mujhe ye jo chote chote leads hai inka khud bataye main kya karunga main manufacturing agar khol ke baitha hu to main ye 10 10 15 15 40 40 piece banaunga.
Customer: Nahi.
Customer: 200 piece ka order ho to.
Customer: Nahi chahiye na 200 piece ye suniye ye 200 piece bhi ye plastic hai main plastic ka kaam karta hu kya?
Customer: Aap mujhe na ek baar detail me batayega aap plastic me deal karte hai iron me karte hai metal me.
Customer: Maine sara mention kiya hai wooden toys.
Customer: Wooden wooden mere bhi item me wooden toys ke alawa koi bhi item nahi dikhega.
Customer: Aur ye sab khud banaya hai maine apne aap.
Executive: Achha apne hatho se banaya hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Kyunki aap log to kaam karke nahi dete.
Customer: Uttar Pradesh nahi pura India chahiye.
Customer: Ab dekho kaha hai iske andar by lead by lead dikhao mujhe pehle.
Executive: Educational toy 5000 piece.
Executive: 5 piece likh lenge plastic hai sir.
Executive: Wooden wooden alphabet toy.
Executive: Sir ye lead aapke kaam ki lag rahi hai sir GST 5000 piece hai ye six.
Customer: Haan haan haan ye Surat se hai 1000 piece ka.
Customer: Achha ek cheez aur profile agar koi dekhta hai meri usme koi nahi dikhta ki profile dekh kaun raha hai.
Executive: Aap catalog view me jayenge sir catalog view me.
Executive: Yaha pe jo bhi lead aapko dikhegi na wo wo customer aapke profile pe visit kiya hua rehta hai wo aapki aap profile pe aake kam se kam 10 15 minute visit karke aaya tab hum uske andar lead bana karke yaha pe upload karte hai catalog view me yaha pe.
Customer: Main wahi to keh raha hu ye pehle suno meri baat jab mere paas wo nahi tha na kya bolte hai isko package nahi tha to isme by lead bhar bhar ke aati thi.
Executive: Catalog view.
Customer: Aur jab se ye liya hua hai na haan jab se maine liya hua hai koi mere paas na to kisi ke phone aate hai aur na by lead aa rahi hai kisi ki.
Customer: Jab se package liya hai.
Executive: Mujhe lag raha hai maine teen saal ka package bahut galat le liya aap logo se.
Executive: Haan sir bilkul mujhe lag raha hai kabhi aapko chahiye hi nahi kaam.
Executive: Haan ji sir business hai IndiaMART pe hai ye maine aapko dikh kyu nahi raha hai.
Executive: Abhi maybe sir aapke jo product side hai na kahi na kahi wo categories me na plastic add ho gaya hoga sir isko hum ek baar dekhte hai aap.
Customer: Aap log dekhte hi nahi ho aap.
Executive: Sir ye NCERT jadui pitara kids aisa ye jo product hai aapka kids Saharanpur ye jo iska category add hai sir NCERT book ki category add hai ye sahi hai sir ki galat hai.
Customer: Hata hata do isko.
Executive: Educational toy me aate hai hum ye wooden toy dal do.
Executive: Kyunki sir category match honi chahiye agar category match na hoga sir na to fir leads aapko wo aayegi galat leads aayegi sir.
Customer: Dekho isme khud sari ki sari apne hath se ek baar khud check kar lo theek hai.
Customer: Ab mujhe to nahi pata ki kya hai.
Executive: Ye wooden toy maine add kar diya pehla primary category educational toy me kar diya jaise wooden toy ko primary kar deta hu wooden ko primary kar deta hu isko secondary kar deta hu sir category na bahut important hoti hai isliye maine bola ki ek baar category dekhte hai ye geo board me add hai sir ab batao kaha se aapko lead aayegi sahi hai sir ye wooden educational geo board ye sirf geo board geo board to hota hi hai geo board hmm koi geo board agar search karega to geo board hi aayega na wooden usme educational toy to aayega nahi.
Executive: Plastic ki bhi hoti hai sir geo board.
Customer: Nahi plastic ke hote hai lekin hamare to wooden ke hai wooden ka search kar lo isme wooden geo board agar hai to.
Customer: Kaha hai iske andar geo board.
Executive: Geo ke ye educational ye toy ke andar aata hai sir.
Customer: To isko wahi karo sir.
Executive: Educational toy me kar deta hu isko.
Executive: Ye ho gaya set aur ye sir wooden state sled abacus abacus toy ye wooden abacus me bhi add hai to wooden abacus ye hai abacus ko abacus nahi bolenge isko hum wooden toys thodi dalenge.
Executive: Nahi toy nahi wooden tracking board wooden educational toy.
Executive: Sir ye writing board sahi rahega iske liye?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Wooden educational dal do isme.
Executive: Wooden dominoes wooden dominoes game set ye bhi sahi hai number of something educational educational sahi hai ye bhi.
Executive: Wooden magnetic part wooden.
Executive: Magnetic educational toy ye sahi hai.
Customer: Wooden toys me dal do isko.
Customer: Mujhe aisa lag raha hai ki ye profile hi theek se chal rahi hai baki to sab theek thak dikh raha hai aur aur logo ki sab rating bhi aa rahi hai sabke paas hamare paas ek bhi rating bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Haan sir ye bhi aapki taraf se rating nahi hai matlab rating ka bhi demand aapka waise rating to di thi sir 11 November ko Abhishek Gupta hai aapko five star diya hai delivery ye to maine khud bol ke karwaya hai.
Executive: Aur ye Hemant Kapoor ye bhi bol ke karwaya hai.
Executive: Ji theek hai aur ye request karke insan Singh ne aapko one star ki rating de di hai.
Customer: Hmm isko delete karwa do.
Executive: Ye hum delete nahi kar payenge na aap agar inko phone karke agar aap bole ki sir delete kar do to ye delete kar sakte hai kyunki ek baar reviews padhne ke baad sir hum delete kar payenge.
Customer: Hmm aur sir aur dekh lete hai iski wooden shape sorter wooden block toy me add hai sahi hai aur wooden educational toy me add kar deta hu theek hai isme hi karo hum wooden body parts wooden puzzle ye chala.
Customer: Puzzle kis me aate hai puzzle uski category dhundna ek baar.
Executive: Puzzle puzzle ki category hai sir puzzle naam se wooden puzzle naam se category hai ye dekhiye wooden puzzle isme add kar denge sir wooden jenga block wooden block sahi hai wooden xylophone machine toy sahi hai toy learning toy.
Customer: Theek hai aap dekho ise karo theek hai.
Executive: Sir ek minute ruko aap aur mujhe by lead pe bhi discussion karna hai ye bas do teen reh gaya vegetable puzzle ye bhi ho gaya sahi hai matlab by lead me bhejta hu by lead me ek baar mere se discussion karo sir.
Executive: Maine yaha pe India ka location laga diya hai.
Executive: Ye cross plastic one ye sir isko consume karo aap wooden alphabet toy sir ye send karu aapko main ya fir aapka portal open karke send karu khula hua hai khula hua hai khula hua hai haan mere mere phone me nahi dikha raha hai ye ye thoda sa aap niche scroll kariye.
Customer: Dikha sir aapko?
Customer: Ji dikh gaya.
Executive: Inko consume kariye aap turant baat kariye sir main na aapke account manager se bolta hu ki aapko kam se kam 200 300 piece ki by lead aapko send kare whatsapp pe whatsapp pe waha se aap consume karo sir kyunki na abhi baki idhar matlab jo categories hai na mismatch ho gayi thi is wajah se aapko achi leads nahi aa rahi thi plastic ki aa rahi thi leads to aa rahi thi bas plastic ki aa rahi thi is wajah se abhi aapko na pattern set karo pehle jo aapko lead send kiya jayega whatsapp pe usko use karo fir pattern set hoga fir aapko automatic aapke profile se wooden wali leads aana start ho jayegi.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai okay okay thank you aur sir niche search karke dekh
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants leads from all of India, not Saharanpur.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads received.

- Profile not showing who is viewing it.

- Feels package was a wrong decision.

- Ratings are not good.



Resolution:

- Executive shared screen to check profile.

- Removed NCERT books category from profile.

- Added wooden toys category to the profile.

- Corrected category for geo board and abacus.

- Will send buyleads on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will ask account manager to send buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, category, wooden toys, ratings
